snippet.title: ⚔️ BOROS MOX LEGENDS far exceeded my expectations! 【 MTG Modern Gameplay 】
snippet.description:
📄 Decklist (TCGplayer) ➤ https://bit.ly/32nTZr3
For today's Modern gameplay video, we are playing a Boros Mox Amber Legends Tribal deck that user GauldenWahn took to a 5-0 finish in an MTGO Modern League. This deck has been heavily requested for a long time, so I finally decided to play it over on Cardmarket and managed to get a 9-0 with it. It far exceeded my expectations because I honestly thought this deck was not good, but I was proven wrong. So let's see if we can get a similar record here today.

⭐️ ManaTraders (Code MERYNMOON_VZK to save 15%) ➤ https://www.manatraders.com/?medium=MerynMoon

🧡 Patreon ➤ https://www.patreon.com/MerynMoon

📺 Twitch ➤ https://www.twitch.tv/mavendragon

📱 Tiktok ➤ https://www.tiktok.com/@merynmtg

🐤 MTG Twitter ➤ https://twitter.com/MerynMTG
🐥 Personal Twitter ➤ https://twitter.com/Maven_Dragon

🎮 Discord ➤ https://discord.gg/K7juWXGzhf

🔥 Previous Decks We Played ➤ http://bit.ly/MerynDecks

✉️ For Business Inquiries ➤ merynmtg@gmail.com

#MTG #MagicTheGathering #Modern
